author: Midwinter Minis
description:
I hope you found this list useful, and that whoever you're buying them for loves them... even if that person is you!

Nothing in this video is sponsored. Here's the list of books with links:

Imaginative Realism: https://geni.us/imaginativerealism by @JamesGurney 

Color Index XL: https://geni.us/colorindexxl

Color & Light: https://geni.us/colorlight

Blanche: The Rise of Grimdark: https://geni.us/blanche

Little Wars & Floor Games: https://geni.us/littlewars

Talking Miniatures 1 & 2: https://geni.us/talkingminiatures

Warhammer 40,000 Ultimate Guide: https://geni.us/40kultimate

Color: https://www.angelgiraldez.com/en/producto/color/ by @AngelGiraldeZ 

Terrain Essentials: https://geni.us/terrainessentials by @TheTerrainTutor 

Dice Men: https://geni.us/dicemen

Support us on Patreon, get a shout-out, jump on the Midwinter Minis Discord, and take part in the Painty Points competition! https://www.patreon.com/midwinterminis

Use our Wayland Games affiliate link to buy your hobby stu
title: The nerd in your life NEEDS these books for Christmas
